name: Our Man Bashir Quiz | Star Trek: Deep Space Nine | 10 Questions

questions.text: With which other crew member does Bashir play darts?
questions.explanation:
O'Brien.

	When it was discovered that Bashir was genetically enhanced at the behest of his parents, the only ramification to Bashir was that he had to stand further away from the target.

questions.text: Bashir is the son of Richard and Amelia Bashir.
questions.explanation:
False.

	His mother's name is Amsha, not Amelia. Muslim actress Fadwa El Guindi played Amsha and Brian George played Richard. They appeared in the Season Five episode "Doctor Bashir, I Presume."

Subatoi.

	Julian Subatoi Bashir was born in 2341 and his blood type is B negative.

questions.text: Whom did Bashir first perform surgery on?
questions.explanation:
Kukalaka.

	Kukalaka is Bashir's teddy bear, who underwent an emergency re-stuffing procedure when Bashir operated on him. Bashir was five years old at the time.

questions.text: What sport is Bashir very adept at?
questions.explanation:
Tennis.

	Bashir considered becoming a tennis player, but chose to be a doctor instead. He wanted to help people and know everything that doctors seemed to know. Viewers learned about Bashir's tennis skill in the second season episode "Melora".

questions.text: Bashir was the valedictorian of his graduating class.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Missing one question on the oral part of the final exam, Bashir graduated second in his class. Elizabeth Lense was the valedictorian, which caused some tension when Lense visited DS9 in the third season episode "Explorers".

questions.text: Bashir was thrown back several hundred years in the past, to the time of the Bell Riots. Who else went with Bashir?
questions.explanation:
Sisko and Jadzia Dax.

	The Bell Riots took place around 2024, a time when homeless people were moved into specified parts of towns in order to be more easily controlled. Substandard conditions led to a riot that Sisko, Bashir and Dax helped bring an end to.

questions.text: Which fictional character does Bashir model his holodeck adventures after?
questions.explanation:
James Bond.

	The fourth season episode "Our Man Bashir" details a transporter accident that causes the characters in Bashir's holodeck adventure to look like members of DS9's staff. For example, the villainous Hippocrates Noah looked exactly like Captain Sisko.

questions.text: Whom is Bashir's counterpart in the sixth season episode "Far Beyond the Stars"?
questions.explanation:
Julius Eaton.

	In "Far Beyond the Stars", Sisko has a dream where he is Benny Russell, an African-American writer who pens a story about a space station called "Deep Space Nine". Russell battles against racism to get his story published, shunned because it features an African-American captain. Other crew members of DS9 played Russell's fellow writers and other various roles.

questions.text: With whom does Bashir begin a romance with at the end of the series?
questions.explanation:
Ezri Dax.

	Although he developed a crush on Jadzia Dax, he began a relationship with Ezri Dax after Jadzia was killed by Gul Dukat and Ensign Ezri Dax was assigned to DS9.
